articles.description: Great Britain retain their Olympic team eventing title to win the nation's first gold medal at the Paris 2024 Games.
articles.title: Olympics eventing: Great Britain retain team title for nation's first gold of Paris Games

articles.description: Tom Daley wins his fifth Olympic medal with a superb silver alongside Noah Williams in the men's synchronised 10m platform in Paris.
articles.title: Tom Daley wins fifth medal alongside Noah Williams with silver in Paris

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: All the latest football and transfer news including reaction from the weekend's pre-season fixtures.
articles.title: Football live: Transfer news latest & pre-season updates

articles.description: The swimming leg of the triathlon training at the Paris Olympics is cancelled over pollution in the River Seine.
articles.title: Olympic triathlon: River Seine pollution forces scrapping of training

articles.description: Mercedes’ stunning third win in four races proves there is plenty of life in the F1 season going into the summer break.
articles.title: Belgian Grand Prix: F1 back to unpredictable best at summer break

articles.description: England's 3-0 clean sweep of West Indies was expected, but there are still questions to answer. BBC Sport chief cricket writer Stephan Shemilt takes a look at the most pressing.
articles.title: England cricket: Five questions after victory over West Indies, including Jamie Smith, Chris Woakes & Mark Wood

articles.description: Bob Ballard was referencing the Australian women's swimming team who had won gold in a freestyle relay.
articles.title: Bob Ballard: Olympics commentator axed over sexist remark

articles.description: Andy Murray's retirement remains on hold after an escape act saw the British icon and Dan Evans fight off five match points to win their Olympics men's doubles match.
articles.title: Andy Murray: British tennis great's career continues after Olympics doubles win
